example.title: Sorting Feature
example.metakeywords: php pivot table, php pivot grid, pivot table, pivot grid, php data analysis, php business tool, excel-like data summarization
example.description:
In order to turn on sorting features of KoolPivotTable, you do

	$pivot->AllowSorting = true;

You also can turn on the sorting for each field:

	$field = new PivotField("customerName");
	$field->AllowSorting = true;
	$pivot->AddColumnField($field):
